Detailed Description

Obsolete - the class Menu, which uses the MenuTextPtrArrayIterator, has been replaced by the classes ItemMenu and ItemTree.

Iterator for a text-array with a specified size. This iterator is useful for e. g. the Text-Menu-Accessor.
